quest.name: Fhul Me Once
journal:
R'fhul Tia is mired in the depths of despair.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.

R'fhul is unresponsive to the sound of your voice. He may need a bigger gesture to wake him from his stupor, such as an attempt to /comfort him.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

After speaking with you and Beaudefoin, R'fhul Tia finally understands where he went wrong in his initial attempt through the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course. To inspire him to do his best, you have opted to join him in tackling the course this time. Speak with Beaudefoin to get started.
You have begun your attempt through the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course. Speak with Hildelana upon reaching the halfway point.
You have made it past the halfway point. Speak with P'obyano upon reaching the end of the course.

After completing the course, you proudly watch on from ahead as R'fhul Tia, following your example, tries his best to complete the course─and successfully manages to do so. Seeking a moment to rest, he suggests you take this opportunity to give R'mahja the good news.
After seeing their mentor try his best, R'fhul Tia and his impassioned pair of apprentices were able to make up. Your work concluded, it's time to report the day's events to Haermaga.

You have reported everything that happened to Haermaga. For the time being, it seems there is no need to worry about R'fhul Tia and his apprentices. It's time to relax, don your reward, and enjoy the festivities.

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: Please Forename, you have to do something! I've never seen my brother like this...

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Wh-Why... What did I do wrong?

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: He's too upset to listen...

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: Maybe you could try to comfort him? You're his hero, so if that doesn't work, I don't know what will!

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: Please comfort him, Forename!

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: <sniff> How could this happen... I don't understand...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: R'fhul Tia is gravely despondent. Perhaps comfort from the person he admires will lift his spirits.

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Thank you for showing me such kindness, Forename. I'm still trying to wrap my head around why those two left. Is it because I failed the course? Because I looked pathetic?

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: No, silly, that's not it at all!

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Really? It's not because I looked pathetic?

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Erm... Say, Forename, do you have any idea why?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: It's because you failed. Miserably.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: You weren't taking it seriously.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: You tried to hide from your mistakes.

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: That's true, but that's not the point! It's because he wasn't taking it seriously!

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: Exactly, shehe's exactly right! You didn't take the challenge seriously at all!

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: Hide...from a mistake? I don't quite understand, but it sounds wise! You didn't look like you were taking it seriously, Fhul!

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: I wasn't taking it seriously...? So what? Even if I had, I would've failed all the same. I thought if I did it on purpose, then maybe...

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: Ugh! Who would admire someone who gives up before they've even started? The brother I look up to always does his best, no matter how he looks or what others think of him!

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: If you can't understand that, maybe I'll try the course myself and show you what I mean!

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: (-???-)My, that is some remarkable gumption you have there little miss! Alas, I'm afraid children may not, under absolutely any circumstances, participate in the competition.

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: (-Beaudefoin-)I hope you don't mind, but I overheard your conversation. My opinion? You're a pathetic excuse for an adventurer, R'fhul. Just awful.

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: ...Y-You're right. You taught me so much, yet I put on such a miserable performance. Everyone must think I'm so very pitiful...

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: (-Beaudefoin-)Just listen to yourself, lad. You want to know what your problem is? Vanity. You've lost sight of what's truly important.

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: (-Beaudefoin-)Think back. Try to recall what Haermaga and I taught you─what it was that you admired about Forename in the first place.

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: I...I think I finally understand. I was so focused on trying to impress my apprentices that I didn't fully commit myself to overcoming the challenge, and stopped being an adventurer in so doing... Aye, I became a coward instead.

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: I─I betrayed their trust, and now they've seen me for what I truly am. There's no way I could make it up to them...

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: What if you tried the course again, but took it seriously this time? I bet those two would watch!

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Again? But I've never actually succeeded. If I were to fail once more, I'd lose their respect forever...

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: It doesn't matter if you fail or succeed. What matters is that you try.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Show us what you're made of, adventurer.

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Forename... Thank you! I nearly made the same mistake all over again. This time, I promise you, I will do my best!

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Adventurer... You're right─I'm an adventurer! I need only focus on the challenge ahead!

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: I'm sorry to ask more of you when you've already done so much, but can I ask you to serve as my inspiration once more? If possible, I would like you to go through the course ahead of me.

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Seeing you test your mettle would rekindle my aspirations of becoming a great adventurer. Please, help me to reclaim that dream─let me follow in your footsteps!

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: You doing this─it means the world to me, Forename. I will follow after you with everything I have!

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: You can do it, Forename!

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: I know I can do my best if I'm following after you. When you begin your run through the course, I'll be there, right behind you.

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: I appreciate you looking out for R'fhul like this. If you're ready to go, the jet of water yonder is roaring in anticipation of your arrival!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Should completing the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course prove difficult, seek out a faire adventurer for assistance.

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: Forget about R'fhul while you're jumping through obstacles, dodging explosions, and what have you─just relax, and have a good time! That will prove more fruitful to the lad in the end, anyway.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURERA04541
dialogue.text: You look like you've seen your share of adventure. Hells, I wager you could get through a silly ol' course like this with your eyes closed. That would be something to see─care to show the amateurs how it's done?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Choosing to close your eyes will take you directly to the end of the first platforming section.

dialogue.name: Q4
dialogue.text: Amaze onlookers and yourself by undertaking the course with your eyes closed?

dialogue.name: Q5
dialogue.text: Proceed to the end of the first platforming section?

dialogue.name: HILDELANA
dialogue.text: Beaudefoin's kept me abreast of the situation, and after seeing the way you've carried yourself through the course so far, R'fhul's gotta be fired up!

dialogue.name: HILDELANA
dialogue.text: You're already at the halfway point, so it's not like you need to hear it from me, but good luck!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Should completing the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course prove difficult, seek out a faire adventurer for assistance.

dialogue.name: HILDELANA
dialogue.text: Just halfway to go! I'll be watching how you and R'fhul manage from here!

dialogue.name: ADVENTURERB04541
dialogue.text: Well, well, well, what do we have here...an adventurer head and shoulders above the rest. If the remaining obstacles are to prove a challenge, I believe a handicap is in order. Why not do the rest of the course blind? You're not afraid of a little danger...are you?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Choosing to close your eyes will take you directly to the end of the course.

dialogue.name: Q6
dialogue.text: Prove your courage to the cheeky faire adventurer by undertaking the course with your eyes closed?

dialogue.name: Q7
dialogue.text: Proceed to the end of the course?

dialogue.name: POBYANO
dialogue.text: Congratulations on making it to the end! Ah, I should mention that I've heard about the situation with R'fhul. He pursued you the entire time, never giving up despite the fear in his eyes. Even now...hey, look behind you!

dialogue.name: Q3
dialogue.text: What will you shout?

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: Come on, adventurer!

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: Do not waver! You can do this!

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: I did it, Forename! I really did it! Thank you for leading the way!

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Hah, now that I've made it to the end, I suddenly feel lightheaded... Forgive me, I will return after I've had a moment to catch my breath. Would you mind relaying the good news to Mahja?

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: Bravo, bravo! A job well done─though I expected no less.

dialogue.name: HILDELANA
dialogue.text: Expertly done, Forename! Seems R'fhul managed to keep behind you the whole way. A seasoned adventurer like you can bring out the best in anyone, eh?

dialogue.name: POBYANO
dialogue.text: I was absolutely moved by─well, the way you moved through the course! But I must admit, it was even more touching to see R'fhul gain confidence as he pushed on. Truly, this is the way adventurers are meant to be!

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Sorry I couldn't keep up with you to the very end. My heart may very well burst out of my chest if it beats any faster, so I'm going to rest here for a bit... In the meantime, please let Mahja know what happened.

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: Oh, you're back! How'd it go? Beaudefoin and Haermaga were “comment-trading,” but I want to hear about it from you!

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: He did it─he really did it! I always believed Fhul could, but he never believed it himself. I'm so happy...

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: Fhul! Forename told me everything. I'm so proud of you!

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Oh, I didn't do much. Just followed after herhim, really. Still...it felt good to try, and finally succeed at something.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURERB04541
dialogue.text: Please excuse us for interrupting, R'fhul. Do you have a moment?

dialogue.name: ADVENTURERA04541
dialogue.text: We... We judged you too quickly, and too harshly. It was only when we saw you making your way through the course that it dawned on us how wrong we'd been.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURERA04541
dialogue.text: That's why...

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: You don't have to finish that sentence. I'm the one in the wrong here, after all. I...I am so very sorry, both of you!

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: I let my desire for recognition cloud my judgment, and lost sight of myself in the process. It's little wonder you both reacted the way you did.

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: That's why I'm starting over. This time, I will not waver from the path─nay, I shall follow wherever it leads, as a true adventurer should! With that said...do you think you could forgive me?

dialogue.name: ADVENTURERB04541
dialogue.text: I'll be honest─you were a dismal sight up there at first, looking as if you might collapse at any moment. But you didn't. You pushed through like a true champion, and now we are keen to see how far you'll go. Just like when we first met you.

dialogue.name: ADVENTURERA04541
dialogue.text: Aye, that's why we want you to forgive us...for losing faith, instead of believing in you like we should've. Given the circumstances, I understand if you say no, but... Would you consent to being our mentor once again?

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: Like you even have to ask. I couldn't be happier to have you both at my side!

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: Thank you for bringing Fhul back to his senses, Forename! If you hadn't, these three never would've made up, and I would still be really sad. So...thank you, so, so much!

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: I think we'll be okay now, so maybe you can do that “report” thing that Fhul always talks about? I don't really get it, but it seems important. And don't you worry about Fhul─I'll be watching him carefully!

dialogue.name: RFHULTIA
dialogue.text: This whole ordeal started because of my own foolishness, yet you still held your hand out to me. I've said it before, and I'll say it again─you, my friend, are my inspiration!

dialogue.name: ADVENTURERA04541
dialogue.text: Our mentor's mentor... Does that make you our grandmentor? It's like we're all one big family!

dialogue.name: ADVENTURERB04541
dialogue.text: My entire life, everyone around me has called me cold...but watching you and R'fhul tackle the course lit a fire inside of me. I know now what I aspire to be.

dialogue.name: RMAJHA
dialogue.text: Did my brother thank you properly? Well, let me thank you again just to be safe! Oh, and please don't forget about the “report” thing!

dialogue.name: BEAUDEFOIN
dialogue.text: My, what a satisfying conclusion to this tale! You simply must regale it to Haermaga in all its glory!

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: I could roughly see what happened from here, but I'd appreciate it if you filled in the blanks.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: So the lad finally came to his senses in the end, eh? And he made up with those greenhorns while he was at it, too. You did well, Forename. I was right to count on you.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: With that, he's truly made his first step as a proper adventurer─and better yet, I don't have to feel anxious about leaving the three of them to their own devices anymore.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: Speaking of adventurers, I owe you a reward, don't I? Please, take this. You've more than earned it. And do try to enjoy the Moonfire Faire while it's around.

dialogue.name: HAERMAGA
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）
